best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Provide clear constraints (accepted formats, max size) and validate on the server as well.
Make the entire label clickable and provide keyboard access.
Use aria-live regions for upload progress updates.
Never rely solely on client-side validation for security.
Show file names and sizes to set expectations before submission.

questions.question: Where must file type and size validation ultimately happen for security?
